titleStmt.title: Ram-Alley: or merrie-trickes A comedy diuers times here-to-fore acted by the Children of the Kings Reuels. VVritten by Lo: Barrey.
titleStmt.author: Barry, Lording, 1580?-1629.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Robert Wilson, and are to be sold at his shop in Holborne, at the new gate of Grayes Inne,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads "Merry-tricks" in various spellings.
This edition has catchword on C1r: there.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Holborne, at the new gate of Grayes Inne
